IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 FIRST_ROW  = 2,
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a_bikesharestorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a_bikesharestorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a@bikesharestorage.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_EMP_MD] (
	[EmployeeID] [varchar](10) NULL,
    [LastName] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [FirstName] [varchar](20) NULL
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'dirpayrollfiles/EmpMaster.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a_bikesharestorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_EMP_MD]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_TITLE_MD](
    [TitleCode] [varchar](10) NULL,
    [TitleDescription] [varchar](100) NULL
)
WITH (
		LOCATION = 'dirpayrollfiles/TitleMaster.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [adlsnycpayroll-ahlam-a_bikesharestorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
      FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[NYC_Payroll_TITLE_MD]

    [FiscalYear] [varchar](20) NULL,

    [AgencyID] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [AgencyName] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [EmployeeID] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [LastName] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [FirstName] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [AgencyStartDate] varchar(50) NULL,
    [WorkLocationBorough] [varchar](50) NULL,
    [TitleCode] [varchar](20) NULL,
    [TitleDescription] [varchar](100) NULL,

    [BaseSalary] [varchar] (50) NULL,
